name: Crystalrect
description:
Crystalrect is challenging fast pace 3D auto-runner with stylish and colourful graphics terrace.
Your goal is to flip or jump and avoid all traps through the end of the level based on the terrace color.
With simple button control for this level-based crystal world you can collect all the crystals within the level and set a top score for each level.
Features:
-Fast running, jumping and flipping
-Simple one button control
-Stylish and amazing visual graphic
-Challenging levels
-Challenge your skills and reflexes
-Universal app with iCloud support
-Game Center achievements
-Interactive tutorial on how to play
